title: New free champion rotation: Draven, Kindred, Malzahar and more!

replies.body:
#A Corporate Matter
**Episode: _Orianna And The 20/20 Vision Forest._** _(Note, name may be misleading, as Orianna is not in this story.)_

{{champion:150}} "Why in the world are we out here in the forbidden forest?"

{{champion:96}} "Because, they wouldn't let me have any tea while I was disabled. So we are out here looking for some rare ingredients to make some most delicious tea."

{{champion:150}} "And, why did I have to come?"

{{champion:96}} "You see, a story with just me wouldn't do so well. The people like you and expect you here."

{{champion:150}} "Well, that's a stupid reason."

{{champion:96}} "I know, but the writer couldn't think of anything better."

{{champion:150}} "At least that explains why I followed you out here without knowing why."

{{champion:96}} "Besides, I get lonely searching for things all by myself, chap."

{{champion:16}} "It's ok Gentleman Kog'Maw, I think this is fun."

{{champion:96}} "Be careful out here, there are all kinds of freaky things in these woods. Werewolves and dragons, giant blind spiders. Just stick with me and make sure not to get lost. It's not all bad, though, there are good things in here too. The centaurs are all right, and the unicorns... Uh, guys? Where did you guys go?"

{{champion:150}} "**SORAKA! GENTLEMAN KOG'MAW!!!!** Nope, I'm lost. This is gonna be it for me. I'll probably get eaten by Zergling, or maybe a demon from the nth dimension. At least, then Sam and Dean might investigate my death. Man, I am never going to have Nachos again."

{{champion:60}} "Well then, I guess today is Nacho lucky day."

{{champion:150}} **"WHO SAID THAT? I SWEAR, MAKE ANOTHER PUN LIKE THAT AND I'LL CUT YOU."**

{{champion:60}} "Sadly, many have forgotten my existence, I am Death Blossom Elise."

{{champion:150}} "Death? Oh no, does that mean you are gonna eat me?"

{{champion:60}} "Haha no, we would never eat something like you. Only plants, and humans. Come follow me, I will show you around our flower home."

{{champion:121}} "Who have you brought to our place? We must not get distracted from the war."

{{champion:60}} "It's alright, Death Blossom Kha'Zix, I found him lost and alone."

{{champion:150}} "War, what war?"

{{champion:121}} "We are at war with Elderwood, who think they are the rulers of the forest. And the Haunted, who really just want to kill everything."

{{champion:60}} "Why don't you join in the war?"

{{champion:121}} "Yeah, we could use someone to make a Difference. As I always say, change is good."

{{champion:60}} "Do you have to say that every single time. Is that like, the only quote you have?"

{{champion:121}} "No....... I, uhhh, I must consume and adapt."
_"Turns invisible."_

{{champion:150}} "Yeah, I don't really like fighting or anything. I just love money."

{{champion:60}} "I hear the Elderwoods have a huge treasure stash. If you help us defeat them, you can have a cut."

{{champion:150}} **"TO WAR!!!!!"**

**_Meanwhile:_**

{{champion:16}} "I knew I shouldn't have stopped to smell those flowers. But everyone always told me to do it."

{{champion:7}} "As lone as they aren't blossoms, you should be fine."

{{champion:16}} "Zyra, what are you doing out here?"

{{champion:7}} "I'm Elderwood Leblanc, not Zyra. Why do People always make that mistake?"

{{champion:16}} "Can you help me, I seem to be lost."

{{champion:7}} "Maybe, but first I have to bring news of the war back to base. Come with if you'd like."

{{champion:16}} "This place is so pretty, how could you bring war here?"

{{champion:7}} "There are those that want to take what we have away from us. The Death Blossoms and the Haunted. They all just want to kill everything we hold dear. But our kingdom has stood strong for over forty-four hundred years. Or six, not sure, as league wasn't around that long ago."

{{champion:16}} "I can't let anyone harm this, I will help you defend this place. At least, until the rescue party comes for me."

{{champion:7}} "Thank you, kind goat lady. Elderwood Bard, go collect the forest Meeps. Our final battle will soon be upon us."

{{champion:432}} "♫♫♫♫"

{{champion:16}} "Hey, that's an odd mountain, it looks like its made of wood."

{{champion:7}} "That's no moontain, It's just Elderwood Hecarim."

{{champion:120}} **"HELLO TINY PURPLE SPEC!!!!!!"**

{{champion:16}} **"AHHHHHHH, WHY IS IT SO BIG!!!!!!!"**

{{champion:7}} "Yeah, there's a reason we haven't ever lost a war."

_**Meanwhile:**_

{{champion:96}} "It appears I am on my own now. All by myself, don't want to be, all by myself. Oh, can it be. The one and only, diamond smurf bush. It is said to make tea so tasteful you can see the hand of Rito. But wait, It could be the bronze troll bush, which is toxic to everything. Delectable Tea, or deadly poison?"

_**A few minutes later:**_

{{champion:96}} "Yep, definitely not a diamond smurf. I can already feel the rage setting in. Most, report, team, for, feeding. Blame everything on forever bronze. Never, place, **WARDS!!!!!**"

{{champion:57}} "You look like you could use some help. Here, let me ult, that should carry you up out of that bronze state."

{{champion:96}} "Thanks so much, Haunted Maokai. I was worried I would get permabanned there. Is there anything I can do to repay you?"

{{champion:57}} "Well, we are about to have this big battle with the two factions we are at war with."

{{champion:96}} "I don't know, being a mass machine gun of war is my normal self's dream, not mine."

{{champion:143}} "I am sure their smoking corpses would make some fine tea."

{{champion:96}} "You are right, and it's not really killing if it's a plant, as they aren't really alive."

{{champion:57}}{{champion:143}} _"Stares meanly."_

{{champion:96}} "Oh, but not you two of course. You are half zombie, half plant. Very much full of life. By the way, why are you guys at war?"

{{champion:57}} "The stupid Elderwoods stole my tombstones. They think they can just take what they want. **NOW IT NEVER LOOKS RIGHT WHEN I Q!**"
_"Sobs."_

{{champion:143}} "There there, it's ok. Also, the Death Blossoms somehow keep ending up overpowered and killing everything."

{{champion:96}} "Let's do this then, chaps."

_**Somewhere else in the forest:**_

{{champion:61}} "So this is the Forbidden Forest, I don't know why, but I expected it to be blind."

Orianna, what are you doing here? Great, now you have made me a liar, I said you wouldn't be here."

{{champion:61}} "The ball is angry, it says we have barely gotten any time in these stories."

Yeah, your not the only one. And now you got two whole lines of dialogue. I would say that's enough. Run along now. Great, now I need to rebuild the fourth wall again. **HEY, YOU ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO TALK TO THE READERS, THERE IS NORMALLY A WALL HERE. GO ON, GET AWAY YA RASCALS.**

**Beyond the Void: Season 1- Episode 12**      (Reader Discretion advised for language and offensive dialogue)

**MALZAHAR IS IN THE FREE WEEK!**

_In the mesa between Bandle City and Demacia (or whatever that landform is). Side note: Apparently it is called Yoodoo Lands..._

{{champion:268}} "Ah, welcome to Yoodoo lands!"

{{champion:53}} "Well it's about time we reached flat land. Those mountains were so HARD to pass through... interpret that in anyway I don't give a s**t." 

{{champion:268}} "Well, you are a robot so you probably don't feel any pain in your feet."

{{champion:53}} "Pain? Pain is for fools!"

{{champion:268}} "Yeah and what the f**k would you know about pain? All you really have to do to survive is pull people towards you knock them up and then release energy from your body."

{{champion:53}} "Bah! You probably don't feel anything since all you do is summon soldiers ahead of you and rush to them all day long!"

{{champion:268}} "Fine, fine. Let's not play the blame game here. All we need to do is pass Yoodoo lands and then we are at Demacia!"

_The two keep walking, but they hear a child sobbing. Both Azir and Blitz walk backwards and look at the child, concerned._

{{champion:268}} "Awww, who bullied you?"

{{champion:53}} _Aside to Azir_ "I don't think that's why he is crying... try again."

{{champion:268}} "Awww, did your parents die in an ally?"

{{champion:53}} "That's a low blow Azir. Take a walk you peice of s**t."

{{champion:32}} "No one loves me! WAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!"

{{champion:53}} "Oh f**k, he's one of them. Keep walking beggar!"

{{champion:268}} "You blew lower than me this time. Walk the plank, pussy!"

{{champion:53}} "Fine. Go right ahead your majesty."

{{champion:32}} "Go away you stupid a** mothaf**ka!"

{{champion:268}} "F**ck!"

{{champion:53}} "Ouch. That's not even a burn, but wow he's got a mouth!"

{{champion:268}} "Um, maybe the reason why no one loves you is because you can't control what comes out of your mouth."

{{champion:53}} "Oh, look who the f**K is talking. You can't even--"

{{champion:268}} _yells_ "JUST SHUT THE F**K UP!!!! I WILL TAKE A ROCK AND SHOVE IT UP YOUR ROBOT A** IF YOU DON'T!"

{{champion:32}} "I am so lonely in this world... no one can ever understand."

{{champion:268}} "Is it love, young one?"

{{champion:32}} "Sort of..."

{{champion:268}} "Who was it? Who grabbed that little innocent heart of yours?"

{{champion:32}} "Ashe"

{{champion:268}} "BAHAHAHAHHAHAAHHAHAHA! What the f**k!?!?!? You really thought you would have a chance with HER?!?!?!"

{{champion:32}} _crying_ "Yeah, I did-- WHHAAAAAAAAAAA!" 

{{champion:268}} "Wait! WHAT ARE THOSE!!!!"

_Azir rushed over to the crying child and put his tears in a flask._

{{champion:53}} "What the f**k? Those are TEARS..."

{{champion:268}} "Strange, but quite a phenomenal discovery... I have only seen these on the faces of my prisoners."

{{champion:53}} "Did you treat them with care?.... Ugh, why did I even bother asking that..."

{{champion:268}} "NO! Phhffft! Caring for them would be so bad. I was the generous king and gave them everything they wanted. You know... the usual: daily shankings, pouring tons of acid in their milk, and playing cops and robbers in the cell." 

{{champion:32}} _still crying_ "Take me home... please."

{{champion:268}} "Oh, we will. Don't worry about that."

{{champion:268}} _aside to Blitz_ "Take him home."

_Azir winks at Blitz_

{{champion:53}} _sighs_ 

{{champion:32}} "Wait what? NO! I actually have a physical home wher----"

_Blitz pulls the kid towards him and knocks him up. Azir then summons a soldier and shanks the kid, who was nearly dead._

{{champion:32}} _in agony_ "I HAVE A FEW TRICKS UP MY SLEEVE, FOOLS!"

_The kid released a bright energy circle and stunned both Azir and Blitx dealing tons of damage. Afterwards, the kid manages to escape at the speed of less than 1 mph._

Meanwhile in the Void World...


{{champion:101}} "Master, we have everything you need to initiate the dream sequence."

{{champion:90}} "Perfect. And please, change the name, we are calling it the Nightmare sequence."

{{champion:101}} "What's so special in that name?"

{{champion:90}} "We are going to bring Nocturne back to kill Azir."

{{champion:101}} "Why Azir?"

{{champion:90}} "He has a red cloth that has the ability to control others. He used it on Twitch before..."

{{champion:101}} "I must say, it is a genius plan. The nightmare sequence will destroy Azir for sure."

{{champion:90}} "Yes, but what about his friend, Corporate Gnar?"

{{champion:101}} "We took him in a few months ago, he was still breathing. Since he was barely able to think or speak, we injected him with the serum. I guess we can call him Demon Gnar."

{{champion:90}} "When will he be ready to be released?"

{{champion:101}} "Just a few more tests, sir. I expect him to be ready in a couple of days."

_Xerath bows and then starts to walk out of the Mega hall._

{{champion:90}} "Xerath"

{{champion:101}} "Yes?"

{{champion:90}} "I am done stalling. Get rid of this Rek'sai. She is causing too much disruption in the void continuum by traveling back and forth."

{{champion:101}} "Consider it done."

Buddy, Imma try to be nice with this one.  {{champion:83}}  is gonna come back with a new rework later this year.  Yes I am aware he hasn't been on the rotation in over a year and a half, but he is undergoing some seriously needed changes.  And for all those people who keep asking why {{champion:83}}  isn't back yet, how many of you would ACTUALLY play him?  Honestly, I would maybe once or twice to see if I liked him.  His concept is really cool actually, with those ghouls helping him out and everything.  He just needs tweaking to improve his gameplay in order for him to be the terrifying force he was meant to be (yes I know the "tweaking" has been taking forever, but that was the only verb that came to mind).
